verbose_text: This result indicates that Elg1-RLC cannot unload PCNA from DNA assembled in the absence of the DNA ligase Cdc9 and that the retention of PCNA on chromatin in the Cdc9 degraded cells (XREF_FIG B, sixth lane) is not caused by in vitro re-loading by RFC on nicked DNA.
